article:
{{Infobox Newspaper | name = Press | image = | type = Daily newspaper | format =
Tabloid | foundation = 15 December 2005 | political = Center-right Populism |
owners = see below | headquarters = 27. marta 69/14, 11000 Belgrade,
Serbia | editor = see below | ceased publication = 15 November 2012 |
website = [http://www.pressonline.rs/ www.pressonline.rs] | }} 'Press' was a
daily middle-market tabloid newspaper published in Belgrade.

Press Publishing Group also owns a daily aimed at businesspeople called Biznis,
as well as a lifestyle weekly magazine Lola and a glossy monthly magazine called
FAME. Founded in late 2005, the company has quickly established itself as one of
Serbia's leading media
enterprises. [http://www.ekapija.com/website/sr/page/143426 (E
Magazin) Munjevit razvoj kompanije Press Publishing Group pruÅ¾io je primer
kolegama iz novinarske branÅ¡e, E-Kapija, December 13, 2007]

According to its most recent annual financial report submitted to Serbian
Economic Register Agency, the company has 136 employees and it posted an annual
profit of RSD58,830,000 (approximately â¬ 0.7 million at the time) for the
calendar year 2007. http://pretraga.apr.gov.rs/RepsisPublicSite/Publ-
ic/Enterprise/AnnualFinancialReport.aspx?BusinessEntityId=1109769&RegistryCode=-
20208961&rnd=2122029498 Finasijski izvestaj za 2007
